title: Additional benefits to certain school personnel
context: [ยง302A-632] Additional benefits to certain [school personnel and] teachers. The department shall provide additional benefits to grade level chairpersons, department heads, registrars, and librarians in schools. The department shall also provide additional benefits to teachers assigned to schools in areas designated as limited environment communities by the department. [L 1996, c 89, pt of ยง2]
